food.description: Чашка с темным и роскошным горячим шоколадом, сопровождающаяся тарелкой с хрустящим, жареным печеньем, которое нужно макать в шоколад

cities.description: Barcelona is the capital city of the autonomus community of Catalonia in the Kingdom of Spain

food.description: The yeast and the beaten egg whites which are folded into the batter work together to produce a light crisp waffle

food.description: This world-famous dish is a creamy mix of arborio rice, saffron, grated cheese, butter, white wine and chicken stock

cities.description: Milan is the capital of the Lombardy region, and the most populous metropolitan area and the second most populous commune in Italy
